name: llm-notify-hub
description: Unified notification hub for LLM interfaces - monitors Claude.ai, ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok, Claude Code, and Codex

scripts.package:mac: npm run build:mac-arm && mkdir -p downloads && cd .build/macos && zip -r '../../downloads/LLM-Notify-Hub-Mac-ARM.zip' 'LLM Notify Hub.app'
scripts.package:mac-intel: npm run build:mac && mkdir -p downloads && cd .build/macos && zip -r '../../downloads/LLM-Notify-Hub-Mac-Intel.zip' 'LLM Notify Hub.app'
scripts.package:win: npm run build:win && mkdir -p downloads && cd .build/windows && zip -r '../../downloads/LLM-Notify-Hub-Windows.zip' 'llm-notify-hub.exe'
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:linux && mkdir -p downloads && cd .build/linux && zip -r '../../downloads/LLM-Notify-Hub-Linux.zip' 'llm-notify-hub'
scripts.package:all: npm run package:mac && npm run package:mac-intel && npm run package:win && npm run package:linux
